summary: Ahlam has finally grown tired of Nazeem and is releasing her pent up fury against him. Once Ahlam spots Nazeem, the hunt begins.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[color=#a4c2f4][size=6]RUN LIKE THE WIND NAZEEM[/size][/color]

[color=#ea9999]
[/color]
[size=5][color=#b4a7d6][/color][/size][/center][left][size=5][color=#b4a7d6]INTRODUCTION[/color]
[/size]
Ahlam has finally grown tired of Nazeem and is releasing her pent up fury against him. Once Ahlam spots Nazeem, the hunt begins.

This mod basically makes Ahlam attack Nazeem on sight. There has also been a few tweaks on Nazeem which you can check under CHANGED DETAILS below.

[color=#b6d7a8]This mod is for anyone who wants[/color]
-Nazeem to suffer in a brand new way
-to kill Nazeem more than once
-some nice background action in Whiterun
-to spectate an epic city hunt
-to beat up Nazeem without getting a bounty
-someone else to beat up Nazeem for you

This is my first mod so I will need feedback and suggestions for the mod. Thanks.


[size=5][color=#b4a7d6]CHANGED DETAILS[/color]
[/size]
Ahlam will now attack Nazeem on sight.
Nazeem is cowardly.
Guard will ignore crimes against Nazeem.
Nazeem will respawn (Nazeem is protected instead in the Lore Friendly version. So that only players can kill him.)
Nazeem has been given a health boost of 500 (Vanilla health in the Lore Friendly version.)
Nazeem will act like a female.
The Iron Dagger in Ahlam's inventory has been removed.


[color=#b4a7d6][size=5]CHANGE LOG
[/size][/color]
[color=#ea9999][size=3]0.9.2 & 0.9.2L[/size][/color]
Nazeem will not use weapons.


[color=#ea9999][size=3]0.9.1 & 0.9.1L[/size][/color]
Altered Ahlam's routine to make her more likely to see Nazeem


[size=3][color=#ea9999]0.9.0L[/color]
[/size]Lore Friendly version released.
Instead of Nazeem respawning, he is protected and will only be able to die by the player's hands.
Health boost removed. 

[color=#ea9999][size=3]0.9.0[/size][/color]
Initial release.
Added the changed details listed above.


[color=#b4a7d6][size=5]COMPATIBILITY
[/size][/color]
Should be compatible with all mods that doesn't alter the changed details above.


[color=#b4a7d6][size=5]KNOWN ISSUES[/size][/color]

A small note to make about using this mod with the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47327/?]Cutting Room Floor[/url]. CRF gives Nazeem a new home outside of Whiterun, so he'll probably be spending most of him time there. Shouldn't be any problem but Ahlam might chase Nazeem for a long distance.
No requirements aside from Skyrim.


[color=#b4a7d6][size=5]REQUIREMENTS[/size][/color]

Skyrim


[color=#b4a7d6][size=5]CREDITS[/size][/color]

Credit for the original idea goes to TeofaTsavo. She commented on the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53069/?]No one cares about Nazeem[/url] about making Ahlam attack Nazeem. Got permission from TeofaTsavo to use her idea.

Mods used in screenshots
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17802/?]Climates Of Tamriel - Weather - Lighting - Audio[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37460/?]Dawn of Whiterun[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56639/?]JK's Whiterun
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1111/?]Pure Waters[/url][/left]
[left]Credit to DarnellNugget for creating a bunch of Nazeem mods which propelled me to make this one.[/left]
author: cepirablo
